title: 1980 Budd Co. 45’ Semi-Truck Trailer (Contents NOT Included)
item_description:
1980 Budd Co. 45’ Semi-Truck Trailer (Contents NOT Included)

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1980
  • Make: Budd
  • Model: YS2S450A62
  • VIN: 188793M
  • License: 4SW6849 (not included/lost)
    • Expiration Date: 12/31/2021
    • 02/24/20 EXEMPT BY STATUTE, REGISTRATION DEFERRED
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 68,080 Lbs
  • Trailer Type: Enclosed

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 540”
  • Overall Width: 95”
  • Overall Height: 157”
  • Deck Length: 540”
  • Deck Width: 90”
  • Side Height: 103”
  • Width Between Fenders: 90”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 11R24.5
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: Certificate of Title and Transfer Forms will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. Seller purchased this trailer in 2019 but didn't complete transfer into their name, they have the original signed title. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
